Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone for Mature Users
Reviews.Author: Fabio PY
Reviews.Content: I love this phone . It takes  away the worries of taking care of the phone as it takes care of itself lol...Tested with a few drops , in some ice chest and it's a nice music player for under the shower with wet finger tracking ( yup... you can use your phone while wet)The fact of having a dual core cpu and 512Mb of Ram do not affect the performance of the phone with the use i give it  and as Jelly Bean manages very well resources as long as you do not download overload it with applications ( specially the  useless ones ).The battery is a winner , 18 hours with a moderate 3g/Wifi use .No LTE, no HD display , Poor GPU ,Accelaration and no Flash .For that I have a gaming PC and a Sony camera. This is a phone.

Reviews.Title: Caterpillar CAT B15 IP67 Rugged Android Unlocked GSM Single SIM Smartphone
Reviews.Author: George Lake
Reviews.Content: Real tuff, my brother loves it and he wants another one for his next phone line.. he loves the fact it's android and can do all the things he could with his old phone and more

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Ashwin
Reviews.Content: Extremely rugged, tested it to the limits. Fell on the screen a few times from a height of around 5 ft. and still not a scratch!

Reviews.Title: Great until you do break it- Not an American phone.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great phone, but two stars for when you do break it (face down on a pebble will do) the warranty will cover it- in the Czech Republic.Pros:  A certain sort of stylish, shrugs off anything short of a direct strike to the screen, and there is what amounts to a two year road hazard warranty on the screen.  Dropped it half a dozen times on New York City sidewalks without any sign of damage.  The waterproofing makes the on-off switch something that must be gotten used to, but used several times in the rain just fine.Cons:  Warranty service execrable.  One of the quintessential American companies should have parts and service available in America, right? I mean the warranty phone number is in New York, and I work in Manhattan.  Easy!Parts and service (which are not separable) are available from one, count it, ONE service center in the Czech Republic. USPS won't take it (Lithium Ion Battery, $23-) and UPS store wants $216-.When I asked warranty about a customs form she sent me a UPS label.  I did what I do with Lenovo, packed it and put the label in a zip-lock on the outside, dropped it with UPS.  Which got it shipped back to my home in New Jersey.  They need a customs form.The people I've dealt with have been are very nice customer service people.  They are in a system that is, to look at it generously, not well designed.  None are native English speakers, and the Czechs don't even have phone number to call (not that I'd want to go through the whole phone card routine for warranty).As it stands now it's a writeoff- parts unobtainable.  Got four months out of it.Update: Well there I was with a cracked screen.  What do I do with it? Contrary to instruction I stripped it (door, battery, everything) and shipped it, priority mail, no tracking, $22-.  Got an e-mail from someone else, turned it over to a tech, who also e-mailed me for a return address.  Got it back in about a month.  Works great.Customer service on warranty Grade "F".  Technical service Grade "A".I think this is aiming a US brand at a foreign market, where a retailer customarily supports the phone.  If you buy it from an American dealer that doesn't brag about warranty service (and this review is going up on Amazon, so expect to save $200- over such an operation) you'll have to figure it out.

Reviews.Title: really good phone
Reviews.Author: Freddy Silva
Reviews.Content: It a very good phone, using it in Venezuela, so I would say YES it works perfectly...Yes, it's an international unlocked phone.

Reviews.Title: mine supervisor this is your product
Reviews.Author: Jorge Luis Barcasnegras "BARCAS"
Reviews.Content: I am working for one of the biggest mine coal in america. my job is 50-60% in the field. I need to take pictures even under the rain and mud - dust - oil are everywere. With these kind of this around, Iphone or Samsung is not a good telephone. Instead, B15 has all you need. I need to buy at least 4 more for the rest of my group. BUY IT.

Reviews.Title: Best resistant Phone.
Reviews.Author: Gaston Molnar
Reviews.Content: For use in hostile work environments. Is a really good option for usability and practicality. High benefits best resistance and long life without damage.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Luis Hidalgo Lara "Amura"
Reviews.Content: Great product , all the videos are true, is the cell phone for work people , resist strong hits and is nice

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: patty spencer
Reviews.Content: This phone is awesome my husband loves  it he had several iPhone's that he loved so switching to android was a change but he loves it and shows it off to everyone and brags about it. By now he had dropped and broken the screens on his iPhone's but his cat phone is still perfect. Love love love this phone

Reviews.Title: Excelent service
Reviews.Author: Carmen Luisa Barre
Reviews.Content: Great phone, and I got on time was for a present and make happy the new owner if this phone.

Reviews.Title: Really good Phone
Reviews.Author: Juan
Reviews.Content: I'm happy with my Cat B15 i had a Seals Ts3 cell phone but i prefer the Cat B15, I can assure you that it is a good investment

Reviews.Title: Good phone, not awesome but good
Reviews.Author: Nestor Padilla
Reviews.Content: Like it a lot, heavy duty kind of so I would recommend if you are not looking for last generation Andriod phone, still it is a hard phone, scratch, water and dust resistant... Still havent let it fall but so far so good.

Reviews.Title: best phone
Reviews.Author: Julian
Reviews.Content: Best phone on the market by far. Love it for the job site only wish it had a flash hard to take photos or flashlight

Reviews.Title: not what was described
Reviews.Author: M. Brown
Reviews.Content: unlocked SINGLE sim smartphone .....not a single sim phone its a duel sim .....missing replacement rubber parts ...forging charging plug ..... .... .... ... .. not happy at allso I have had this phone for about 3 weeks now the screen is fogged up and has moister in it water proof yeah like a sheet of paper battery last a long time but its gotten to the point were you cant see the screen and the white dots behind the battery turned pink indicating water got behind it from were my only guess was from sweat in my coveralls would not recommend this phone

Reviews.Title: Great phone for a person that works in a demanding construction or outdoor environment.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: All the Android features you'd expect.  the camera is top-notch!  Perhaps more detailed instructions would help a newbie to figure out how to use it, but I'm not afraid to play with it and figure it out on my own.  Touch keyboard is very accurate, better than any other phone I've owned.

Reviews.Title: not worth it
Reviews.Author: ahmad saadeldeen
Reviews.Content: i have many problem with cat b15did not work with 3g and its too slowits not worth it

Reviews.Title: Industrial smartphone
Reviews.Author: Juancarlos Agudelo
Reviews.Content: I work in aviation maintenance, this phone its reliable, tough, takes the abuse. I put it inside the tool bag. not a scratch, already fell  3mts on to the pavement: Only the battery came apart. phone worked normally again.Sound shoul be improved, since its an industrial phone, should sound louder. Camera could be improved too.Smartphone features work sweet.

Reviews.Title: Phone is great
Reviews.Author: Paulo
Reviews.Content: Misses flash on the back camera and the camera is low resolution compared to other phones.Overall a good phone

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: EDGAR YESID HERNANDEZ HERNANDEZ
Reviews.Content: GREAT PRODUCT MEETS ALL EXPECTATIONS, SUPER STRONG, THE USE IN SOUTH AMERICA AND RUNS PERFECT, THE BEST I HAVE HAD

Reviews.Title: Great phone.
Reviews.Author: Jessika
Reviews.Content: I got this for my brother who is not careful and doesn't do much with phones but texting and calls (when he does uses it) and so far he loves it. I actually gave it a look before giving it to him ad I really like all the extra functions it has on the camera even though the resolution on it wasn't really good (there is a slightly chance that I'm not fairly judging it since I tried it inside my house <low light> at night, so maybe outside with natural light it would be better). I'll say It feels like an iPhone 5 on your hands but probably lighter...  Android... He put it on the water and the phone kept on going... :) ... By the way my brother lives in Guatemala, and he didn't have any problems activating it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect gift
Reviews.Author: ticobuyer95
Reviews.Content: This was the perfect gift for my so busy husband, I couln't done any better. He loves it, and  seriously!

ProductInfo.Features:
The CAT® B15 is IP67 certified.
It runs on Android 4.0 (Jelly Bean) and is loaded with features like Wi-Fi, an FM radio,Media player and file storage can be expanded using MicroSD cards.
Scratch-proof Corning® Gorilla® glass screen.
Drop it 1.8 meters head-first onto concrete and it bounces back - even the screen.
Aluminum body in a toughened, rubberized casing with minimal openings.
ProductInfo.Name: Caterpillar CAT B15 IP67 Rugged Android Unlocked GSM Single SIM Smartphone
